sent.orig: Therefore, there is at least one logically possible world in which a maximally great being exists.
sent.trans: 因此，有在的至少一个逻辑地可能的世界一最大地伟人being存在。

sent.orig: However, don't go overboard with this concept either, as many are just being, and not doing.
sent.trans: 然而，也不要狂热追求这个概念，因为许多人仅仅“存在”(being)，而不“行动”(doing)。

sent.orig: In the intersubjectivity view, cyberspace is field of dissimilar being-with- others.
sent.trans: 从主体间性的视角来看，网络空间又是不同的主体“与他人共在”(Being-with-others)的场域，主体之间在网络空间的双向交互性促成了网络共同体的形成。

sent.orig: They're being connected. They're being fused together. They're being integrated within the enterprise.
sent.trans: 这些部分将互相连接起来融为一体，在企业内部实行整合。

sent.orig: It is much like being in the frontier of being awake and being asleep.
sent.trans: 这非常像是在清醒和睡眠的交界处。
